Summary: large glowing white with yellow tint object seen, chased by aircraft.
divs: sighting detailsi am located @ 40���1'20.8"n by 79���51'6.1"w. i was watching tv when a light from my window caught my eye. the light was not like a normal airplane. this light was solid white with a slight yellow tint. it also had a slight twinkle to it. it moved across the sky and would slow down then speed back up. i noticed behind the object was first 1 plane\jet then another. then another coming from another the object. they all seemed to be following or chasing this object.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Grindstone
